###User Defined Function###
_WinAPI_SetCursor

###Description###
Establishes the cursor shape

###Syntax###
#Include <WinAPI.au3>
_WinAPI_SetCursor($hCursor)

###Parameters###
@@ParamTable@@
$hCursor
	Identifies the cursor
@@End@@

###ReturnValue###
Success: The handle of the previous cursor, if there was one. If there was no previous cursor, the
		return value is 0.

###Remarks###
None.
